Package mil.nga.geopackage.extension.nga.scale

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TileScaling
    Tile Scaling object, for scaling tiles from nearby zoom levels for missing tiles
    TileScalingDao
    Tile Scaling Data Access Object
    TileScalingTableCreator
    Tile Scaling Extension Table Creator
    TileTableScaling
    Abstract Tile Table Scaling, for scaling tiles from nearby zoom levels for missing tiles http://ngageoint.github.io/GeoPackage/docs/extensions/tile-scaling.html
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TileScalingType
    Tile Scaling Type enumeration for defining scaled tile searching of nearby zoom levels in place of missing tiles
